title: 我是新手
author: 大MB
txt_content: 我是一个新来的新手，打击有什么知道的有趣消息告诉我一下呗{:10_492:}{:10_492:}{:10_492:}{:10_492:}{:10_492:}file:///c:/documents and settings/administrator/application data/360se6/User Data/Temp/avatar.php?uid=814833&size=smallfile:///c:/documents and settings/administrator/application data/360se6/User Data/Temp/avatar.php?uid=814833&size=smallfile:///c:/documents and settings/administrator/application data/360se6/User Data/Temp/avatar.php?uid=814833&size=small

replies.txt_content: 新人你好?，请问您嘞发的一大串乱码是什么？？[pumpkin]还有，我是南瓜脸大大，很高兴认识你~
